description:
Kindaichi unmasks the Game Master, reveals their murderous motive, and shows how their tricks were done. But will the game of death claim one more victim?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Game no Kan Satsujin Jiken File. 3
L`affaire des meurtres dans la demeure du jeu - Dossier 3
The Game Mansion Murder Case, File 3
ゲームの館殺人事件 File.3
